info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 19 at 8:34PM CDT until April 19 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Central Pecos County in southwestern Texas... Brewster County in southwestern Texas... Southeastern Jeff Davis County in southwestern Texas... Presidio County in southwestern Texas... Western Terrell County in southwestern Texas...
* Until 1000 PM CDT.
* At 834 PM CDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 23 miles north of Marathon to 21 miles north of Terlingua to 27 miles south of Big Bend Ranch State Park, moving south at 45 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...Satellite indicated dust plume along a cold front.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 240 and 292.
Locations impacted include... Terlingua Ranch Lodge, Santiago Peak, Elephant Mountain Wildlife Management Area, Panther Junction, Presidio Lely International Airport, Marfa, Barton Warnock Environmental Educational Center, Firestone Test Track, Fort Stockton, Terlingua, Shafter, Fort Stockton-Pecos County Airport, Adobes, Big Bend National Park, Chinati Mountains, Alpine, Alpine-Casparis Municipal Airport, Paisano Pass, Chisos Basin, and Terlingua Ranch Airport.
info.instruction:
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
There is no safe place on a highway when a dust storm hits. Visibility can be lost immediately, making it difficult or impossible to slow down and avoid stopped vehicles. Delay travel, or safely exit the highway before the dust storm arrives.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 10:00 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 10:00 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Brewster, TX; Jeff Davis, TX; Pecos, TX; Presidio, TX; Terrell, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 10:00 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 10:00 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Brewster, TX; Jeff Davis, TX; Pecos, TX; Presidio, TX; Terrell, TX
